members.member:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can drag and drop markers on the map at any location.
true to enable marker drag and drop functionality; otherwise, false to disable marker drag and drop functionality. The default value is false.
You can enable or disable the marker drag and drop functionality through mouse or touch interactions in the component.

member.summary: Gets or sets the data source for the bubble. The data source can contain data such as color, and the other information that can be bound to the bubble, and tooltip of the bubble.

member.summary: Sets and gets the delay time for the animation in marker.

member.summary: Sets and gets the dash-array for the marker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.DataSource
member.summary: Sets and gets the data source for the marker. The data source for the marker will contain latitude and longitude values to specify the location of the marker. The data source can contain data such as color, shape, and other details that can be bound to the color, shape, and tooltip of the marker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.Fill
member.summary: Sets and gets the color for the marker in maps.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.Height
member.summary: Sets and gets the height of the marker in maps.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.ImageUrl
member.summary: Sets and gets the URL for rendering the marker as image.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.ImageUrlValuePath
member.summary: Sets and gets the value path from the marker data source for the image of the marker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.LatitudeValuePath
member.summary: Defines the value path from the marker data source for setting latitude for a set of markers.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.LegendText
member.summary: Sets and gets the text for the legend from the marker data source.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.LongitudeValuePath
member.summary: Defines the value path from the marker data source for setting longitude for a set of markers.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.OffsetX
member.summary: Sets and gets the X position value of the marker in the Maps component. When this property is set, the marker will render a certain distance from the provided longitude value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.OffsetY
member.summary: Sets and gets the Y position value of the marker in the Maps component. When this property is set, the marker will render a certain distance from the provided longitude value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.Opacity
member.summary: Sets and gets the opacity for the marker in maps.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.Query
member.summary: Sets and gets the query to select particular data from the marker data. This property is applicable only when the data source is created by data manager.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.Shape
member.summary: Sets and gets the shape of the marker in maps.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.ShapeValuePath
member.summary: Sets and gets the value path from the marker data source to set the shape of the marker.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsMarker`1.Visible
member.summary: Enables or disables the visibility state of the marker based on the marker data source in maps.

members.member:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can drag and drop markers on the map at any location.
true to enable marker drag and drop functionality; otherwise, false to disable marker drag and drop functionality. The default value is false.
You can enable or disable the marker drag and drop functionality through mouse or touch interactions in the component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.Points
member.summary: Gets or sets definition of the points that make up the polygon shape. The Maps component includes a polygon shape element that can be displayed over a geometry map or an online map.
member.value: A collection of points that define the polygon shape.
member.remarks: You can set a collection that contains the polygon shape's latitude and longitude values.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the color that will be used to fill the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts a string value representing a color.
member.remarks: You can change the color inside the polygon shape with this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color to be used in the polygon shape's border.
member.value: Accepts a string value representing a color.
member.remarks: You can change the color of the polygon shape's border using this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.BorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the polygon shape's border.
member.value: Accepts the double value representing the border width.
member.remarks: You can change the polygon shape's border width using this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.BorderOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity of the polygon shape's border.
member.value: Accepts a double value ranging from 0 to 1 to represent opacity.
member.remarks: You can change the opacity of the polygon shape's border using this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity of the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts a double value ranging from 0 to 1 to represent opacity.
member.remarks: You can change the opacity of the polygon shape using this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.TooltipText
member.summary: Specifies the text to be displayed in the tooltip for the appropriate polygon shape. If it is not set, the tooltip will not be displayed.
member.value: Accepts the string value, which displays as a tooltip.
member.remarks: This property is used to define the text content to be displayed as a tooltip for the polygon shape.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.TooltipTemplate
member.summary: Specifies any HTML content as a custom tooltip for the polygon shape. If it is not set, the built-in tooltip will not be displayed.
member.value: Accepts the user-defined HTML content that displays as a tooltip.
member.remarks: This property is used to define the template content, such as text, table, images, and other HTML elements, to be displayed as custom tooltips for the polygon shape.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygon.ShapeType
member.summary: Specifies the type of shape, such as polygon or line string, to be rendered on the maps.
member.remarks: This property defines the shape of the polygon to be rendered on the map layer, which can be either a polygon or a line.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.Visible
member.summary: Shows or hides the tooltip of the polygon shapes. When this property is set to false, the tooltip for all the polygon shapes in a layer will not be shown.
member.value: Accepts the boolean value to show or hide the tooltip for all the polygon shapes.
member.remarks: You can show or hide the tooltip for all the polygon shapes in the map layer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color for the tooltip of the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts the string value, which represents the color as in HTML elements.
member.remarks: The property is used to change the background color of the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value as in the color CSS style of the HTML element, such as hex color code, rgb value, rgba value, hsl value, and others.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the border of the tooltip of the polygon shape.

member.remarks: The property is used to change the border color of the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value as in the color CSS style of the HTML element, such as hex color code, rgb value, rgba value, hsl value, and others.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.BorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the border width of the tooltip of the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts the number value that represents the border width.
member.remarks: The property is used to change the border width of the tooltip of the polygon shape.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.BorderOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the border opacity of the tooltip of the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts the number value from 0 to 1 that represents the opacity.
member.remarks: The property is used to change the border opacity of the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the font family of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape. The default value of this property varies based on the Theme property value set in the Maps component.
member.value: Accepts the string value, which represents the font family as in HTML elements.
member.remarks: The property is used to change the font family of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value as in the font family CSS style of the HTML element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.FontWeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the font weight of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts the string value, which represents the font weight as in HTML elements.
member.remarks: The property is used to change the font weight of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value as in the font weight CSS style of the HTML element.

member.remarks: The property is used to change the font style of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value as defined in the font style CSS style of the HTML element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.FontColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts the string value, which represents the font color as in HTML elements.
member.remarks: The property is used to change the font color of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value as in the color CSS style of the HTML element, such as hex color code, rgb value, rgba value, hsl value, and others.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.FontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts the string value that represents the font size.
member.remarks: The property is used to change the font size of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value as in the font size CSS style of the HTML element, which normally holds pixel values.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.FontOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape.
member.value: Accepts the number value from 0 to 1 that represents the opacity.
member.remarks: The property is used to change the opacity of the text in the tooltip of the polygon shape. This property takes the value from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsPolygonTooltipSettings.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration for the tooltip of the polygon shape on the mobile device.
member.value: Accepts the number value that represents the duration in milliseconds.
member.remarks: This property is used to change the duration of the tooltip for polygon shapes. It specifies the time in milliseconds after which the tooltip will be removed on a mobile device. If the value is set to 0, the tooltip will not be removed. If the value is set to greater than 0, the tooltip will be removed after the specified duration.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.MapsTooltipSettings.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration for the tooltip in the mobile device.
member.value: Accepts the number value that represents the duration in milliseconds.
member.remarks: This property is used to change the duration of the tooltip. It specifies the time in milliseconds after which the tooltip will be removed on a mobile device. If the value is set to 0, the tooltip will not be removed. If the value is set to greater than 0, the tooltip will be removed after the specified duration.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Maps.SfMaps
member.summary: The Maps component is ideal for rendering maps from GeoJSON data or other map providers like OpenStreetMap, Google maps and Bing maps. Its rich feature set includes markers, labels, bubbles, navigation lines, legends, tooltips, zooming, panning, and much more.
